sentences.en: Better return home and make a net than long for fish by the waterside.
sentences.cn: 临渊羡鱼,不如退而结网.

sentences.en: Correct conduction of precautions can reduce or diminish waterside corrosion.
sentences.cn: 防止措施正确实施可减小或杜绝水侧的腐蚀.

sentences.en: Don't play at the waterside. You might fall into the water!
sentences.cn: 不要在水边玩耍, 小心掉下去!

sentences.en: Hanging our instruments of music on the trees by the waterside.
sentences.cn: 我们把琴挂在那里的柳树上.

sentences.en: Her garden stretches down to the waterside.
sentences.cn: 她的花园一直延伸到河畔。

sentences.en: Once again look at waterside pavilions, still romantic.
sentences.cn: 再次看亭台水榭, 依旧浪漫.

sentences.en: The lovely Lo Fo of the western land Plucks mulberry leaves by the waterside.
sentences.cn: 秦地罗敷女,采桑绿水边.

sentences.en: The Mother and Bears are not along the waterside, but they are near the water.
sentences.cn: 线索5--熊妈妈和小熊并不是沿着水边, 但它们都靠近水边.

sentences.en: The Mother and Cub Bears are not along the waterside, but they are near the water.
sentences.cn: 线索5--熊妈妈和小熊并不是沿着水边, 但它们都靠近水边.

sentences.en: There are still bears to be encountered though, albeit from the safety of our boat - two cubs and a grizzly idling along the waterside; a black bear emerging from the river.
sentences.cn: 我们居然遇到了熊，尽管我们安坐在船上——一头大灰熊和两只小熊在水边闲逛，一头黑熊从水中冒出头来。

sentences.en: There are three waterside pavilions, zigzagging bridges and covered walkways winding around the hills and ponds.
sentences.cn: 有水边有三个亭台, 蜿蜒曲折的小桥和隐蔽幽静的小路环绕者山丘和池塘.

sentences.en: There was great excitement among the Moorish people at the waterside.
sentences.cn: 海边的摩尔人一阵轰动.

sentences.en: They strolled down to the waterside.
This park is located on the hill by the waterside.
sentences.cn: 这公园在水边的小山上.

sentences.en: Waterside plants such as calamus, reed general Zhi Cong in shore.
sentences.cn: 水边植物如水葱、菖蒲 、 芦苇等一般在岸边丛植.

sentences.en: We would rather live in a waterside suburb.
sentences.cn: 我们宁可住在河边的近郊.
